message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $100. Could you consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to make a bit more of a concession, but I still need to make a profit. How about $115?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at the halfway point between $110 and my previous offer. How about $112.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, Alice! However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $111?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I think we're getting very close to a deal. How about $112?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice! I'm getting close to accepting, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $111.50?
I'm not willing to go any lower than this, Bob. I think $112.50 is a fair price for this amazing product. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
